Package com.scandilabs.catamaran.util

Interface Summary
Timestamped  
 

Class Summary
ArrayUtils Utilities related to arrays
BeanPropertyComparator Compares a given property (sortPropertyName, set in constructor) on two beans (which must both have a getter for the sort property)
BetterProperties Enhancements to java.util.Properties
ClassUtils Utility methods for dealing with java Class objects
CollectionUtils Handy operations on Collections
CommonFieldValidations Framework independent validation utils.
DaemonUtils Helper methods related to executing java programs as UNIX-style daemons
LRUCache<T,E> An LRU(ish) cache (Least Recently Used) that also expires entries that are too old
NumberUtils  
PasswordUtils  
SharedSecretNoSaltHelper A simple security scheme for authenticated services.
SpacePreservingProperties Properties implementation that respects spaces in property key names
StringUtils  
ThreadLocalUtils A local utility class to retrieve ThreadLocal variables.
ThreadSafeSimpleDateFormat A threadsafe implementation of SimpleDateFormat.
TimedSet<E> A non-ordered cache that expires entries older than X millis.
URIUtils Utilities for java.net.URI
ZipCodeUtils
